thread.title: January 2017 Restaurant Weeks: Celebrate the New Year with Savings
thread.title_full: January 2017 Restaurant Weeks: Celebrate the New Year with Savings

author: Caroline Potter
title: January 2017 Restaurant Weeks: Celebrate the New Year with Savings
text:
* Bethesda Magazine Restaurant Week brings you $16 lunches + $36 dinners, January 13-22. Make a reservation . 
* dineLA Restaurant Week has an option for every appetite with $15, $20 + $25 lunches and $29, $39 + $49 dinners, January 13-27. Make a reservation . 
* Ann Arbor Restaurant Week in Michigan arrives soon with $15 lunches + $28 dinners, January 15-20. Make a reservation . 
* Newport Beach Restaurant Week rolls into town with $15, $20 + $25 lunches and $30, $40 + $50 dinners, January 16-29. Make a reservation . 
* Asheville Restaurant Week has three ways to save with $15 two-course lunches, $30 three-course dinners, and $30 dinners for two, January 17-26. Make a reservation . 
* SF Restaurant Week brings you the best of the Bay Area with $15 + $25 lunches and $40 + $65 dinners, January 18-29. Make a reservation . 
* Berkeley Restaurant Week delights with gourmet $20 lunches and $25 + $35 dinners, January 19-29. Make a reservation . 
* Oakland Restaurant Week has oh-so-delicious deals with $20, $30, $40 + $50 lunches and dinners, January 19-29. Make a reservation .
